title: Dawson Geophysical  DWSN  Shares March Higher  Can It Continue
content:

title: Dawson Geophysical  DWSN  Catches Eye  Stock Jumps 6 3
content:
Dawson Geophysical Company   NASDAQ DWSN   was a big mover last session  as the company saw its shares rise above 6  on the day  The move came on solid volume with far more shares changing hands than in a normal session  This continues the recent uptrend for the company as the stock is now up more than 39  in the past one month time frame 
In the last 30 days  the company has seen one downward estimate revision and the Zacks Consensus Estimate also moved lower  suggesting there may be trouble down the road  So make sure to keep an eye on this stock going forward to see if this recent move higher can last    Dawson Geophysical currently carries a Zacks Rank  3  Hold   while its  is 0 00  A better ranked stock from the broader Oil Energy sector is Comstock Resources Inc    NYSE CRK    which holds a Zacks Rank  2  Buy  Is DWSN going up  Or down  Predict to see what others think   or

title: Baker Hughes  BHGE  Surges  Stock Moves 8 8  Higher
content:
Baker Hughes  a GE company   NYSE BHGE   was a big mover last session  as the company saw its shares rise nearly 9  on the day  The move came on solid volume too with far more shares changing hands than in a normal session  This stock  which remained volatile and traded within the range of  29 94  34 97 in the past one month time frame  witnessed a sharp increase yesterday The move came after the company announced that its board has authorized Baker Hughes  a GE company  LLC to repurchase up to  3 billion of its common units from GE and BHGE  The company has seen five negative estimate revisions in the past few weeks  while its Zacks Consensus Estimate for the current quarter has also moved lower over the past few weeks  suggesting there may be trouble down the road  So make sure to keep an eye on this stock going forward  to see if this recent move higher can last Baker Hughes currently has a Zacks Rank  5  Strong Sell  while its  is negative Baker Hughes Incorporated Price    A better ranked stock in the Oil and Gas   Field Services industry is Dawson Geophysical Company   NASDAQ DWSN    holding a Zacks Rank  2  Buy   You can see
